item.title: Please Help! [317]

item.description:
@Tom wrote:

/*
 *        ObjectHandler.java
 *
 *        Created by Clawz Fury
 *
 *        To Handle Objects!
 *
 *        FOR FIRST CLICK OBJECTS
 *        ONLY!
 *        
 */
import java.io.BufferedReader;
import java.io.FileNotFoundException;
import java.io.FileReader;
import java.io.IOException;

public class ObjectHandler {
        public void objectId(int Object) {
                boolean used = true;
                client c = (client) server.playerHandler.players[ID];
                if (c.ObjectID == Object) {
                        switch (Object) {
                case 10689: // lowercase etc
                        c.addItem(4566, 1);
                        c.addItem(4565, 1);
                        c.addItem(2476, 1);
                        c.addItem(2460, 1);
                        c.addItem(4079, 1);
                        c.addItem(4037, 1);
                        c.addItem(4039, 1);
                        c.addItem(6541, 1);
                        c.addItem(6059, 1);
                        c.addItem(773, 1);
                        c.sM("Fun shit.");
                break;
                }
           }
     }
}

??

item.title: Please Help! [317]
item.dc:creator: @Clawz_fury lare69
item.description:
@Clawz_fury wrote:

I created a ObjectHandler about yesterday, and whenever I try and compile so I can test it out, it gives me 100 errors. I’ve tried playing around with the brackets but no luck.

The handler:

[code]/*

  • ObjectHandler.java
  • Created by Clawz Fury
  • To Handle Objects!
  • FOR FIRST CLICK OBJECTS
  • ONLY!

*/
import java.io.BufferedReader;
import java.io.FileNotFoundException;
import java.io.FileReader;
import java.io.IOException;

public class ObjectHandler {
public void objectId(int Object) {
boolean used = true;
client c = (client) server.playerHandler.players[ID];
if (c.ObjectID == Object) {
switch (Object) {
Case 10689:
c.addItem(4566, 1);
c.addItem(4565, 1);
c.addItem(2476, 1);
c.addItem(2460, 1);
c.addItem(4079, 1);
c.addItem(4037, 1);
c.addItem(4039, 1);
c.addItem(6541, 1);
c.addItem(6059, 1);
c.addItem(773, 1);
c.sM(“Fun shit.”);
break;
}
}
}
}[/code]

I just made this to test if it could work, I’m going to clean it up, so please don’t flame me about how it’s messy and needs conventions or stuff like that.

Read full topic
